shape

Class FrogShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape.FrogShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MoveableShape

    public class FrogShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements MoveableShape
    A frog that can be moved around a JFrame using the FrogShape's translate(int, int) method.
    Author:
    Andrew Markley, Cory W. Cordell

    • Constructor Summary

      FrogShape(int x, int y, java.awt.image.BufferedImage frog)
      Constructs a MoveableShape object with the image of a frog.
